title: Ping
body: Title says it all, I have terrible ping. early in the day and around after 12 pm I get ok ping, around 80 ping. but between like 3 PM to 12 PM i have 400+ ping. please help. its not my internet. doesnt happen in other games.

replies.body: I'm having the a similar ping problem! Ever since the recent update 6.21 I am having ping spikes in game every 30 seconds or so. Jumping from 60 to 300. I don't normally have a problems with my ping, so I'm guessing it could be a problem on riots end.
for 2 days i got permanent 160 ping, what is the problem?

This could be happening for various reasons, especially if it's happening at different times.  If you have any scans or updates scheduled for your PC that requires downloading stuff, that could be taking up some of your network.  Other could be how your ISP is routing to the game server during those times.  Use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide which can help fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
